interestingcomments.content: The JPEG stored alongside the raw file serves as a high-resolution preview so the camera doesn’t have to create it on the fly. The alternative would be to embed this preview in the raw file, to no obvious advantage.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: The JPEG stored alongside the raw file serves as a high-resolution preview so the camera doesn’t have to create it on the fly. The alternative would be to embed this preview in the raw file, to no obvious advantage.

interestingcomments.content: It seems that the A7s is not supported as yet, but once it is (probably a matter of weeks) you should be able to open your files in CS4.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: It seems that the A7s is not supported as yet, but once it is (probably a matter of weeks) you should be able to open your files in CS4.
